div.div: World-class education—free of charge—for District of Columbia children in grades pre-kindergarten through 5th grade.

div.class: dfd-info-box clearfix style-01 layout-01 idinfobox5e9cf7deb56ad text-center

div.class: dfd-info-box clearfix style-01 layout-01 idinfobox5e9cf7deb5abf text-center

div.style: font-family:Raleway; font-weight:700; font-style:normal; font-size: 20px; color: #ffffff !important; line-height: 24px; letter-spacing: 1px;

div.div: We need your support! Donations to Yu Ying are fully tax deductible-we are a 501c3 organization.

div.class: dfd-info-box clearfix style-01 layout-01 idinfobox5e9cf7deb5eb2 text-center

div.style: font-family:Raleway; font-weight:700; font-style:normal; font-size: 20px; color: #ffffff !important; line-height: 24px; letter-spacing: 1px;

div.div: Recognized once again in 2016 as the “Best Elementary School” out of all of DC’s public, charter, and private elementary schools.

div.h1: A Passion for Quality Public Chinese Immersion Education
Washington Yu Ying is a Top Tier School

div.h2: We provide an engaging, inquiry-driven, Chinese–English dual language immersion environment to nurture tomorrow’s global leaders.

div.h5: A DYNAMIC SCHOOL PROGRAM 多元化课程

div.p: In today’s interconnect global world, bilingualism is power—and a global norm.
Washington Yu Ying takes its name—meaning nurturing excellence—from a groundbreaking girls’ school founded in 1911 in Beijing, China.

div.h5:
VOTED DC’s BEST ELEMENTARY SCHOOL
最佳小学

div.p: Each year Washington City Paper polls DC locals to find the cream of the crop in over 300 different categories. In 2013 and 2015, Yu Ying was recognized as the “Best Elementary School.

div.h5: AN IB WORLD SCHOOL 国际文凭学校

div.p: After completing an intensive authorization process, Yu Ying became an International Baccalaureate (IB) World School in 2013.

div.class: six dfd_vc_hidden-xs columns vc-column-extra-class-5e9cf7dec5224 dfd-background-dark vc_custom_1460480457860

div.h3: Yu Ying is a community where diversity is key to success.

We work hard to create an inclusive, welcoming environment for our students, families, and staff. And at the same time, we strive to provide resources, tools, and events that support and strengthen our entire community

div.p: We want every student to feel welcome. We believe in equality for everyone, regardless of race, gender, gender identity, ethnicity, religion, or sexual orientation.

div.class: six div_block columns vc-column-extra-class-5e9cf7deceb2e dfd-remove-left-padding dfd-apply-mobile vc_custom_1460543841264

div.h2: One of the most diverse schools in the U.S.

div.p: Washington Yu Ying PCS Elementary is ranked on the Public School Review’s list of “Most Diverse Schools in the U.S.”
As a Yu Ying supporter, you can help ensure that we continue to offer premier children’s education—today, tomorrow and in the future.

div.div: Both of my kids go to Yu Ying. They love to speak Chinese so much that they speak it at home to one another, especially when they don’t want us to know what they are talking about!

I am very honored that our students are able to participate in so many presidential activities where they get the opportunity to showcase their Mandarin. We are all very proud” Maquita Alexander, Head of School at Washington Yu Ying.
Seeing how students grow is inspiring. They are really learning through the dual-language approach and they’ll grow up to be well-rounded, global citizens that just happen to speak Chinese.
